unnormalised: Arrey bhai, solar rooftop subsidy toh mast hai! Suna hai Chennai mein aunty Padma ko mil gaya, electricity bill aadha ho gaya! Socho, bill ki tension ke bina IPL dekhna. Diwali bonus fix! Par process thoda fast hona chahiye, BSNL jaisa speed kabhi kabhi. Rs. 20,000 subsidy madad karta hai, par zyada awareness chahiye, khaaskar gaon mein. Agle Onam, sabke liye biryani savings se!
normalised: Arrey bhai, solar rooftop subsidy toh mast hai! Suna hai Chennai mein aunty Padma ko mil gaya, electricity bill aadha ho gaya! Socho, bill ki tension ke bina I P L dekhna. Diwali bonus fix! Par process thoda fast hona chahiye, B S N L jaisa speed kabhi kabhi. Rupee twenty thousand subsidy madad karta hai, par zyada awareness chahiye, khaaskar gaon mein. Agle Onam, sabke liye biryani savings se!
text: Arrey bhai, solar rooftop subsidy toh mast hai! Suna hai Chennai mein aunty Padma ko mil gaya, electricity bill aadha ho gaya! Socho, bill ki tension ke bina IPL dekhna. Diwali bonus fix! Par process thoda fast hona chahiye, BSNL jaisa speed kabhi kabhi. Rs. 20,000 subsidy madad karta hai, par zyada awareness chahiye, khaaskar gaon mein. Agle Onam, sabke liye biryani savings se!
